text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, big broth… I mean Trainer! Good morning.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, big sist… I mean Trainer! Good morning.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: A picture book. It's my favorite story called, "The Blue Rose of Happiness"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: This story takes place in a garden that is filled with roses. The roses came in all sorts of different colors, and everyone who visited the garden would be filled with happiness.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But one day, a never before seen blue rose bud had sprouted.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The other roses and the people that came to the garden all said, "A blue rose is a terrible omen, it will surely bring misfortune."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hearing this, the blue rose started to believe in its own misfortune and gradually started to wither…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, but the story doesn't end there! Before the blue rose fully withered away, a big brother appeared.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh, but the story doesn't end there! Before the blue rose fully withered away, a big sister appeared.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That's right! He was kind and had a gentle smile. Upon seeing the blue rose bud, the big brother said with a smile,

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: "A blue rose is wonderful! One day it will surely bloom into a beautiful rose! Please let me buy it!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: "A blue rose is wonderful! One day it will surely bloom into a beautiful rose! Please let me buy it!"

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Afterward, the withered blue rose was planted in a pot. Everyday, the older brother would encourage the blue rose and then just as he said, it bloomed beautifully.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Afterward, the withered blue rose was planted in a pot. Everyday, the older sister would encourage the blue rose and then just as he said, it bloomed beautifully.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The flower was then moved to a windowsill, and from then on all of the people that walked by were able to see the blue rose were filled with happiness.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The flower was then moved to a windowsill, and from then on all of the people that walked by were able to see the blue rose were filled with happiness.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You think so too? That makes me so happy!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ever since I was young, from the first time that I read this story I've always to become like the blue rose.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Instead of a useless girl that brings misfortune to others, I wanted to become like the blue rose and make everyone happy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Around the time I started to think like this, my mother took me to a race track.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Because the race track is always filled with people, I've always tried to avoid it in order to not cause any misfortune for others.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I can still remember that day so clearly. Everyone around me was watching the race track with big smiles on all of their faces.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: And when the girl that everyone was cheering for won the race, everybody in the stands became so happy!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I thought to myself, I also want to become like that girl.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Instead of a useless girl that could only bring misfortune to others, I wanted to become a horse girl that could make everyone happy.
choice_data_list: If it's you, you can definitely do it.
If it's you, you can definitely do it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer!…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Thank you! I'll make sure to work hard on my training!
After that, Rice Shower again diligently worked hard on her training.
And then finally…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, you said you had something important today?
choice_data_list: Your debut race has been decided!
Your debut race has been decided!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: M-my debut race!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Then that means soon I'll be…
choice_data_list: Do you think you can do it?
Do you think you can do it?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: T-thats…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'll be fine. I won't do what I did during the Selection Race…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Especially now that you're with me, I'll do my best! Go Rice… Go!!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh… That just now was a special chant my mom taught me. She told me, "If you say these words, you'll feel like you can do anything."

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Would you also like to try it?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Me too! Go!!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: [giggle]… hahahaha!
And so another day of training ended. With the debut race as our goal, we felt confident in our preparation and morale was also running high.
Or so I thought…
The day of the debut race.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Found you! Hey hey, aren't you Rice's trainer?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Good! Then let's make our way to the dorms!
choice_data_list: Hold on a minute! What's going on?
Hold on a minute! What's going on?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: You see, since this morning Rice has been playing hide and seek with everyone at the dorms!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Everyone including Hishi Ama-san and Bakushin O-san have been looking for her this whole time! It looked like fun so I also joined in!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Thinking could it be here? I peeked into an empty room and managed to find Rice-chan but…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: In a small voice she whispered to herself, "Trainer"!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Rice-chan probably wants you to find her!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: So let's go! I'll lead the way!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Urarara! Did you manage to find Rice… hey!? Why did you bring the trainer over here!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You didn't plan on letting him into the dorms did you!? You know that trainers aren't allowed into the dorms!!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: What!? I'm sorry! but this is what Rice-chan wanted…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ahhh whatever! Since it can't be helped I'll be making an exception this one time! I'll get permission from the dorm manager so hurry up and go!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Thanks! Let's go Trainer it's this way!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Let's see… Knock knock! Rice it's me!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Urarara, why are you here!?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I've brought over your trainer just like you wanted!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer…
